channel.title: Death loot visible only by the killer
channel.description:
I'm looking for help on this tricky problem, I'm trying to figure out how to stop a third party from viewing the loot dropped by players.
I would like the loot from a players death to be only seen by his killer, stopping loot stealing/harvesting from a random player.
Thank you in advance, Rosejuice.
